titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to establish a national cemetery for veterans in the Pikes Peak Region of Colorado.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S165)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
1/4/2007--Introduced.
Directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to establish a national cemetery for veterans in the Pikes Peak region of Colorado.
